title: M.L.S. Playoff Preview: An L.A. Derby and More Questions Answered
description: Major League Soccer’s playoffs have reached the conference semifinals as the league sprints to finish before the World Cup.
dc:creator: Jesus Jiménez
category: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
media:description: Samuel Grandsir and the Los Angeles Galaxy will face Carlos Vela and Los Angeles F.C. in the M.L.S. playoffs on Thursday.
